content.description:
This pitch may be the best at the wall and is definitely the longest. It has a few rests on it but is surprisingly sustained too.

Climb past 3 bolts to mantle an awkward ledge then turn the corner left. From the ledge, gain the thin outer face (crux) past more bolts to a sloping ledge and headwall feature. Move left past the headwall (crux) and onto upper face passing a few more bolts and thin climbing to the anchor. Lower/rap.
content.protection: 9 bolts to a 2 bolt lowering anchor.
content.location:
This is the furthest left (downhill) route at the "Stash". Start to the left and across the chimney from

Hot Line

.

content.description: Just uphill from the main wall is an orange buttress, Orange Crank climbs past 8-9 bolts up this to 2 bolt lowering anchor. The crux is moving right on slopers at the halfway point.
content.location: It is uphill from the main wall. Rappel to descend.

content.description: This is a fun and exciting mixed bolt and gear route on the left side of the main wall. Climb past 5 bolts, and make a wild traverse left over the alcove to gain a crack. Sew up the juggy finger crack to the top and 2 bolt belay.
content.protection: 5 bolts, gear: fingers to hands,  medium-large stoppers.
content.location: It is on the left side of main wall near tall dead tree. Rappel to base from anchor at top.

content.description: This has thin face moves up clean rock. Too bad it's not longer! It has 5 bolts to a lowering anchor.
content.location:
This is uphill and around corner from

Orange Crank

.

content.description: This has thin face climbing on clean incut edges following the black streaks up the center of the wall. It is classic with some spice!
content.location:
Start as for

Bad Bowl

, but move left immediately.

content.description: This is the easiest route here and definitely one of the best. Start on right side of main wall near huge pine tree, climb 5 bolts, step left to crack and overlap. Plug in cams as you pull sweet moves to the top. Bring anchor slings for the tree at the top.
content.location: Start on right side of main wall near huge pine tree. Bring anchor slings for the tree at the top.
